subject: Here below we have replaced
body:
Here below we have replaced you this account details to make the payment since yesterday Wednesday 22 November 2023.
Bank name: Old Point National Bank

Amount: $590.00
USE THE ACCOUNT DETAILS WE REPLACED TO MAKE THE PAYMENT SWIFTLY AND SEND SLIP FOR AN IMMEDIATE CONFIRMATION.

subject: Re:   Here below we have replaced
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your message. I appreciate the information you've provided. However, could you please clarify a few things for me? 

Firstly, could you explain why the account details were replaced? And secondly, what is the purpose of this payment? I'm just trying to understand everything clearly.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Deirdre
